name: ErrorStatsServiceApi
title: Google
Cloud
ErrorReporting
V1beta1
ErrorStatsServiceApi
description: An API for retrieving and managing error statistics as well as data for individual events.

methods.name: project_path
title: Google
Cloud
ErrorReporting
V1beta1
ErrorStatsServiceApi.project_path
methods.description: Returns a fully-qualified project resource name string.

methods.name: match_project_from_project_name
title: Google
Cloud
ErrorReporting
V1beta1
ErrorStatsServiceApi.match_project_from_project_name
methods.description: Parses the project from a project resource.

params.name: service_path
params.description: The domain name of the API remote host.

params.name: port
params.description: The port on which to connect to the remote host.

params.name: channel
params.description: A Channel object through which to make calls.

params.name: chan_creds
params.description: A ChannelCredentials for the setting up the RPC client.

params.name: client_config
params.description:
A Hash for call options for each method. See
Google::Gax#construct_settings for the structure of
this data. Falls back to the default config if not specified
or the specified config is missing data points.

params.name: timeout
params.description: The default timeout, in seconds, for calls made through this client.

params.name: app_name
params.description: The codename of the calling service.

params.name: app_version
params.description: The version of the calling service.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/error_reporting/v1beta1/error_stats_service_api"

ErrorStatsServiceApi = Google::Cloud::ErrorReporting::V1beta1::ErrorStatsServiceApi
QueryTimeRange = Google::Devtools::Clouderrorreporting::V1beta1::QueryTimeRange

error_stats_service_api = ErrorStatsServiceApi.new
formatted_project_name = ErrorStatsServiceApi.project_path("[PROJECT]")
time_range = QueryTimeRange.new

# Iterate over all results.
error_stats_service_api.list_group_stats(formatted_project_name, time_range).each do |element|
  # Process element.
end

# Or iterate over results one page at a time.
error_stats_service_api.list_group_stats(formatted_project_name, time_range).each_page do |page|
  # Process each page at a time.
  page.each do |element|
    # Process element.
  end
end

params.name: project_name
params.description:
[Required] The resource name of the Google Cloud Platform project. Written as projects/ plus the Google Cloud Platform project ID.

Example: projects/my-project-123.

params.name: group_id
params.description: [Optional] List all ErrorGroupStats with these IDs.

params.name: service_filter
params.description: [Optional] List only ErrorGroupStats which belong to a service context that matches the filter. Data for all service contexts is returned if this field is not specified.

params.name: time_range
params.description: [Required] List data for the given time range. Only ErrorGroupStats with a non-zero count in the given time range are returned, unless the request contains an explicit group_id list. If a group_id list is given, also ErrorGroupStats with zero occurrences are returned.

params.name: timed_count_duration
params.description:
[Optional] The preferred duration for a single returned +TimedCount+.
If not set, no timed counts are returned.

params.name: alignment
params.description:
[Optional] The alignment of the timed counts to be returned.
Default is +ALIGNMENT_EQUAL_AT_END+.

params.name: alignment_time
params.description:
[Optional] Time where the timed counts shall be aligned if rounded
alignment is chosen. Default is 00:00 UTC.

params.name: order
params.description:
[Optional] The sort order in which the results are returned.
Default is +COUNT_DESC+.

params.name: page_size
params.description:
The maximum number of resources contained in the underlying API
response. If page streaming is performed per-resource, this
parameter does not affect the return value. If page streaming is
performed per-page, this determines the maximum number of
resources in a page.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

returns.description:
An enumerable of Google::Devtools::Clouderrorreporting::V1beta1::ErrorGroupStats instances.
See Google::Gax::PagedEnumerable documentation for other
operations such as per-page iteration or access to the response
object.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/error_reporting/v1beta1/error_stats_service_api"

ErrorStatsServiceApi = Google::Cloud::ErrorReporting::V1beta1::ErrorStatsServiceApi

error_stats_service_api = ErrorStatsServiceApi.new
formatted_project_name = ErrorStatsServiceApi.project_path("[PROJECT]")
group_id = ''

# Iterate over all results.
error_stats_service_api.list_events(formatted_project_name, group_id).each do |element|
  # Process element.
end

# Or iterate over results one page at a time.
error_stats_service_api.list_events(formatted_project_name, group_id).each_page do |page|
  # Process each page at a time.
  page.each do |element|
    # Process element.
  end
end

params.name: project_name
params.description: [Required] The resource name of the Google Cloud Platform project. Written as +projects/+ plus the Cloud Platform project ID[https://support.google.com/cloud/answer/6158840]. Example: +projects/my-project-123+.

params.name: group_id
params.description: [Required] The group for which events shall be returned.

params.name: service_filter
params.description:
[Optional] List only ErrorGroups which belong to a service context that
matches the filter.
Data for all service contexts is returned if this field is not specified.

params.name: time_range
params.description: [Optional] List only data for the given time range.

params.name: page_size
params.description:
The maximum number of resources contained in the underlying API
response. If page streaming is performed per-resource, this
parameter does not affect the return value. If page streaming is
performed per-page, this determines the maximum number of
resources in a page.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

returns.description:
An enumerable of Google::Devtools::Clouderrorreporting::V1beta1::ErrorEvent instances.
See Google::Gax::PagedEnumerable documentation for other
operations such as per-page iteration or access to the response
object.

methods.name: delete_events
title: Google
Cloud
ErrorReporting
V1beta1
ErrorStatsServiceApi#delete_events
methods.description: Deletes all error events of a given project.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/error_reporting/v1beta1/error_stats_service_api"

ErrorStatsServiceApi = Google::Cloud::ErrorReporting::V1beta1::ErrorStatsServiceApi

error_stats_service_api = ErrorStatsServiceApi.new
formatted_project_name = ErrorStatsServiceApi.project_path("[PROJECT]")
response = error_stats_service_api.delete_events(formatted_project_name)

params.name: project_name
params.description: [Required] The resource name of the Google Cloud Platform project. Written as +projects/+ plus the Cloud Platform project ID[https://support.google.com/cloud/answer/6158840]. Example: +projects/my-project-123+.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.
